title: WatchGuard Firebox Flaw Allows Attackers to Gain Unauthorized SSH Access

content.raw: A security vulnerability has been discovered in WatchGuard Firebox devices that could allow attackers to bypass authentication mechanisms and gain unauthorized SSH access to affected systems. Tracked as CVE-2025-59396, this flaw poses a significant threat to organizations that rely on WatchGuard firewalls for network security and remote management. CVE Details Information CVE ID CVE-2025-59396 Affected […] The post WatchGuard Firebox Flaw Allows Attackers to Gain Unauthorized SSH Access appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
